description._content: Image taken from: Title: "[In the Lena Delta. A narrative of the search for Lieut.-Commander De Long and his companions; followed by an account of the Greely Relief Expedition and a proposed method of reaching the North Pole ... Edited by Melville Philips. With maps, etc.]" Author: MELVILLE, George Wallace. Contributor: PHILIPS, Melville. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10055.e.3." Page: 490 Place of Publishing: Boston, [Mass.] Date of Publishing: 1885 Publisher: Houghton, Mifflin & Co. Edition: [Another edition.] Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002454918 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
